thread.section_title: HomeAdvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HomeAdvisor | www.homeadvisor.com
thread.title: Karen M

author: Karen M
title: Karen M
text:
This is the third time I have used Home Advisor.
1st time was for an electrician. Found one in my area who has been back to fix my DIY projects that I botched. lol
2nd time was for insulation. We decided not to do this.
3rd and most recent time was for someone to come in and re-stretch a rug. I was thrilled to see that there are people who do this and this project was completed quickly.
My only word of 'caution'....once you type in your phone#, you can receive multiple calls in seconds! It is so refreshing to have people eager to work instead of leaving messages that are never returned or am told the job is too small.
